name: Multi Theft Auto
author: daniscript18@outlook.com
description: Multi Theft Auto San Andreas - Native AMD64 & ARM64 Support (MTA 1.6.0+)

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -e

echo "Starting MTA installation..."

# Update and install required packages
apt update -y
apt install -y wget tar ca-certificates unzip

# Detect architecture
ARCH=$(uname -m)
echo "Detected architecture: $ARCH"

# Set download URL based on architecture
if [ "$ARCH" = "aarch64" ]; then
    MTA_URL="https://linux.multitheftauto.com/dl/multitheftauto_linux_arm64.tar.gz"
    echo "Using ARM64 MTA binary"
else
    MTA_URL="https://linux.multitheftauto.com/dl/multitheftauto_linux_x64.tar.gz"
    echo "Using x64 MTA binary"
fi

# Change to temp directory
cd /tmp

echo "Downloading MTA server files..."

# Download MTA server
wget -q "$MTA_URL" -O multitheftauto_linux.tar.gz || { echo "Failed to download MTA"; exit 1; }
wget -q https://linux.multitheftauto.com/dl/baseconfig.tar.gz || { echo "Failed to download baseconfig"; exit 1; }

echo "Extracting files..."

# Extract archives
tar -xzf multitheftauto_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzf baseconfig.tar.gz

# Find the extracted MTA directory
if [ "$ARCH" = "aarch64" ]; then
    MTA_DIR="multitheftauto_linux_arm64"
else
    MTA_DIR="multitheftauto_linux_x64"
fi

if [ ! -d "$MTA_DIR" ]; then
    echo "ERROR: MTA directory $MTA_DIR not found after extraction"
    ls -la /tmp/
    exit 1
fi

echo "Found MTA directory: $MTA_DIR"

# Move base config into MTA directory
cp -r baseconfig/* "$MTA_DIR/mods/deathmatch/"
rm -rf baseconfig

# Change to MTA directory
cd "$MTA_DIR"

echo "Downloading default resources..."

# Create resources directory and download default resources
mkdir -p mods/deathmatch/resources
cd mods/deathmatch/resources
wget -q https://mirror-cdn.multitheftauto.com/mtasa/resources/mtasa-resources-latest.zip || { echo "Failed to download resources"; exit 1; }
unzip -q mtasa-resources-latest.zip
cd ../../..

echo "Moving files to server directory..."

# Create server directory and move files
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cp -r /tmp/"$MTA_DIR"/* /mnt/server/

# Set permissions
cd /mnt/server
chmod +x mta-server-arm64 2>/dev/null || chmod +x mta-server 2>/dev/null || true

# List installed files for verification
echo "Verifying installation..."
ls -la /mnt/server/ | head -n 20

echo "Cleaning up..."
rm -rf /tmp/multitheftauto_linux.tar.gz /tmp/baseconfig.tar.gz /tmp/"$MTA_DIR"
rm -f /mnt/server/mods/deathmatch/resources/mtasa-resources-latest.zip

echo "Installation complete! MTA server is ready."
echo "Architecture: $ARCH"

variables.name: START_FILE
variables.description: The MTA server binary to use (mta-server-arm64 for 64-bit systems)

variables.name: CONFIG_FILE
variables.description: Path to the MTA server configuration file

variables.name: MAX_PLAYERS
variables.description: Maximum number of players allowed on the server
